## Checklist
<!-- Ensure your PR meets these requirements -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated SECURITY.md (if security-related)
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments
- [ ] I have updated inline documentation

### Security
- [ ] I have not committed any API keys or secrets
- [ ] I have verified that `appsettings.*.json` files are not included (except `appsettings.json`)
- [ ] My changes do not introduce new security vulnerabilities

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] My changes do NOT break existing functionality
- [ ] OR: I have documented all breaking changes below

**Breaking Changes Details (if applicable):**
